desc:
Our minimalist, elegant and functional backpack designed for the everyday life in the city. Resistant to light rain.

Dimensions: one size, unisex. Measurements: 42 cm high x 30 cm wide x 15 cm deep. Capacity: 10 liters approx.

Materials: outer structure in a leather-imitation, polyester inner lining, 3D mesh back fabric to promote breathability, anti-slip handles, PU fabric, heat-sealed zippers. Color: light grey, metallized silkscreened packaging.


Features: elastic ribbons to hold laptops (up to 15 inches), notebooks, ebooks or tupper boxes. Two interior pockets: a ""hidden"" back pocket and a front pocket. 3D mesh fabric for a better respiration of your back. Anti-slip fabric on the ribbons and a button with PVC fabric to enforce the contact with the ground.

Do you want to know more? Discover all the details and features of our backpack.
